Welcome to my blog! This is my first post.

You can write your blog posts here using simple text with markdown formatting. Hereâ€™s what you can do:

  • Bold text with **text**
  • Italic text with *text*
  • Links with [text](url)
  • Lists like this one

To add a new post, just create a new file in the _posts folder with the name format: YYYY-MM-DD-title.md

Happy blogging!
